message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product for $950,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire an item valued at $1,200,000 by you, at a price that allows us to maintain a fair margin while still providing you with exceptional value.

Alice, your offer is tempting, but I'm hoping to find a price that works better for both of us. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. This price still provides you with a good profit margin, while allowing me to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer you the product for $900,000. This price allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while still being competitive in the market. I look forward to your acceptance of this offer.
